climatePledgeFriendly.details: Rainforest Alliance seal stands for more sustainable farming methods that help improve farmer livelihoods & mitigate climate change.

features: WHAT YOU'LL GET: Six 5-ounce bars of Tom's of Maine Natural Beauty Bar in Lavender & Shea Scent
WASH AWAY GERMS: Cleaning your hands with natural bar soap helps wash away unwanted germs and bacteria
GENTLE ON SKIN: Tested by dermatologists to retain your skin's natural moisture
PARABEN-FREE SOAP: Moisturizing bar soap made with organic botanicals like coconut oil
TAKE CARE OF YOURSELF NATURALLY: Tom's of Maine bar soap contains no artificial fragrances or preservatives and is not tested on animals
body.description: Bring a gentle clean to your shower routine. Tom's of Maine Natural Beauty Bar Soap features organic botanicals like virgin coconut oil, raw shea butter or Moroccan argan oil, and the soap helps skin maintain its natural moisture. Breathe in the soothing fragrance of Lavender & Shea with every wash. At Tom's of Maine, we want to empower families to live more naturally. With more than 50 years experience combining scientific know-how, naturally derived ingredients and a bit of ingenuity, we make products that are good for you and the planet. As a Certified B Corp, we hold ourselves to the highest social and environmental standards. Plus, we're committed to supporting local communities for meaningful change, donating 10% of our profits to charities supporting health, education and the environment. We call this "doing good, for real," and it impacts everything we do.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Giving for Goodness We use 10% of our profits to improve communities, schools and the environment. Our Products Our Stewardship Model guides us to create natural personal care products that really work. And we're proud to share the source and purpose of every ingredient we use. Caring for the Planet What a world! We respect our beautiful home by constantly looking to lessen our impact—and sometimes leave things better than we found them.

Oral Care Keep your teeth and mouth clean with our line of safe and effective natural oral care products for everyone in the family. Deodorant & Antiperspirant Experience long-lasting odour protection that’s gentle on skin and helps keep you feeling fresh throughout the day. Bath & Body Clean skin with our natural body products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Family Favorite
reviews.reviewText: Our entire family has been using Toms of Maine toothpaste and soap for years and we plan to use their products indefinitely. The coconut scented soap is mild and there are no harsh chemicals being used. My wife has very sensitive skin when it comes to using beauty products, such as soap, but this soap is easy on her skin and effective in cleaning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for sensitive and dry skin, hands and face
reviews.reviewText: I've now been using this bar soap as a hand and facial soap for a couple of years.Yes, on my face!I wanted something to cleanse with on a daily basis that was gentle, scent-free, and plastic-free. And relatively inexpensive! I am an older redhead, and have tried many different cleansers over many years, due to my sensitive skin.This fits my needs wonderfully! I'm happy to say that this bar soap cleanses, for me, in a non-irritating and extremely gentle fashion. I occasionally augment my routine with a pricey cleanser from L'Occitane, but that is really no longer necessary for me; this is the soap I reach for morning and night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Best soap I have ever used especially if you get some kind of a rash.It takes it away eventually.Very soothing and moisturizing soap worth paying for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I enjoy using this soap. The list of ingredients is natural and good for your body. It has a great scent that isn't too powerful but very pleasant. It has a really good lather which I really enjoy. It also makes you feel clean but doesn't give you that "squeaky clean" that leaves your skin dry. After I shower I feel like my skin is moisturized and refreshed. I enjoy the packaging as well it is very minimal and better for the environment. I just wish it was a little more affordable to buy this. Each bar is about 4$ and that seems a little steep. Great soap if you can afford the luxury.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The BEST soap
reviews.reviewText: I started using this soap when they discontinued the beauty bar soap. I loved that soap and it smelled amazing. This soap is also great. I get the coconut and it smells nice and works just as well as the beauty bar. It does not leave any film and cleans gently so that I stay fresh. Compared to other natural soaps I have tried this is superior. Wish I could find in store, but this is a good deal and I will continue to buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: I love this soap it feels so nice on my skin and lathers great shea and lavender nice but the aroma does not last for long and it's ok. I will purchase again. Thank you

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the smell!
reviews.reviewText: This is my favorite soap and I am upset the price went up dramatically for it. It's gentle enough for my sensitive skin and smells very nicely of Eucalyptus. I will keep checking for sales.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for my sensitive skin (Eczema/Dermatitis)
reviews.reviewText: I've been trying for a while now to find a soap that would not irritate my skin. I occasionally get contact dermatitis/eczema so it was quite important that I found something which would not bother my skin. If you're wonder what that means: I basically get rashes, irritations, scales, and/or bumps on my skin quite easily depending on the ingredients in the products that I use on my skin.So here's the story on this soap, I randomly stumbled onto it while in a store one day, and decided to give it a try. I was a bit hesitant as I started using it because I was cautious about some kind of reaction happening, so I used it minimally, and didn't notice any problems. I used it for about a week before deciding I would buy another bar. I eventually started using it quite liberally and it's been working great since. I've actually been buying it for a little while now and I normally buy the 6 pack on Amazon. I would suggest buying that one if you do end up buying it as I've never had a problem with it, and I see a few reviews saying the other ones are oddly sized and such. Personally, I have only used the coconut bar so I can't speak for any of the others. I personally think this soap does a pretty good job at cleansing and moisturizing your skin while not being too harsh on it. One thing I noticed is that it leaves sort of a sheen on your skin (I believe this is one of the oils in it), it dries up a little bit shortly after you dry your hands, but there's still something left behind. You can also taste it a little if you don't dry your hands properly between washing and eating something with your hand. One thing you don't want to do with this bar is leave it in water as it will melt. Make sure you put it in a dry spot after using it or in a soap dish that drains. If you have sensitive skin, I would definitely recommend that you give this soap a try. I can't make any promises but I hope this product works as well for you as it did for me. I'll still search for more products that I can use on my skin, because you never know when a company may decide to change the ingredients or your skin decides that it doesn't want to play nicely with something anymore.

reviews.reviewTitle: good product but too expensive for the size
reviews.reviewText: too small for what i was charged
Excelente producto...barra de jabon de coco...deja la piel limpia suave y con un agradable olor a coco lo volveria a comprar
Me gustaron mucho ya que su aroma es muy fresco Gracias

reviews.reviewTitle: Quizás 2 barras más por el mismo precio
reviews.reviewText: Quizás 2 barras más por el mismo precio
